headline: PPG launches PPG ENVIROCRON Extreme Protection Edge Plus powder coating
summary: PITTSBURGH, October 20, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced the launch of PPG ENVIROCRON® Extreme Protection Edge Plus powder coating, a patent-pending, one-coat innovation that advances edge-protection technology.
